name: Focus Week
description: Schools and companies promote focus and mindfulness programs. People talk about mental clarity, journaling, and controlling their thoughts and dreams.

name: Retro Wave Trend
description: Old music, vintage fashion, and early internet styles become popular again. People start chasing memories and nostalgic feelings in everything they see.

name: Sleep Health Campaign
description: Health experts push better sleep habits and meditation apps. Calm and restful content spreads online as people look for peace and balance.

name: Tech Expo Release
description: A new VR headset and AI dream simulator are revealed at a big tech show. People share strange and creative experiences from their digital dreams.

name: Travel Boom
description: Cheap flights and global events spark a rush for travel. Social media fills with beach videos, mountain shots, and photos from above the clouds.
